item.title: Does Governor Thropp Die In Wicked? His Fate & What It Means For Wicked 2 Explained
item.description: Wickedâ€™s ending presents some shocking revelations, including a character death that some may not have even noticed, but has big consequences.

item.title: Gladiator 2's Lucius Father Twist Is Much Better Than The Roman Rumors
item.description: Gladiator 2 features a big twist when it comes to Lucius' father, which is much better than some of the theories put forth by some of the characters.

item.title: Disney Set Up Moana 2's Demigod Twist 8 Years Ago In The First Movie
item.description: Moana 2 ends with a big twist for a character, which seems to come out of nowhere, but it was actually subtly set up back in the first Moana film.
